summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Occidental Avenue, from King Street to Connecticut Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by retopping the existing pavement, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7464 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
